QuestData.Title: Desecration of the Dead
QuestData.Description: These filthy warlocks are desecrating the dead in the boneyard!$B$B<The farseer trembles as he fails to keep his composure.>$B$BI WANT THEM DEAD!$B$BDestroy the necrophytes. Destroy their demonic abominations.
QuestData.RewardText: For what they've done, it is not enough.$B$B$n, when you find their base, you salt the earth.
